meanings.definition: A person or thing that ends something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was the enders of the school day.
meanings.sent2: The enders of the movie left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent3: The enders of the party forgot to turn off the music.
meanings.sent4: The enders of the race crossed the finish line with determination.
meanings.sent5: The enders of the book revealed a surprising twist.

meanings.sent1: The dessert was the sweet enders of the meal.
meanings.sent2: The enders of the play brought the story to a satisfying close.
meanings.sent3: The enders of the puzzle were missing, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The enders of the journey were filled with memories.
meanings.sent5: The enders of the song left a lasting impression.

meanings.sent1: The enders of the meeting signaled it was time to go.
meanings.sent2: The enders of the argument led to a resolution.
meanings.sent3: The enders of the day brought a sense of relief.
meanings.sent4: The enders of the contract were clearly defined.
meanings.sent5: The enders of the speech left the audience inspired.
